Metadata.Description: The wearer receives a +5 to saving throws vs. magical fire, and is immune to normal fire.
While wearing the ring, the wearer becomes invisible.
The wearer controls 1d8 mammals at a range of up to 60 feet. Control does not extend to people or to giant animals.
The wearer receives a +5 to saving throws vs. poison.
The wearer gains a bonus of -1[+1] to armor class, and +1 on all saving throws.
The wearer gains armor class bonus of -2[+2], and +2 on all saving throws.
